basic_info.description: Hello! My name is Michael Roark, a dedicated Navy veteran with four years of distinguished service, who has transitioned into the realm of software development after a versatile 11-year career spanning industry sectors, including oil and gas and aircraft maintenance. With this diverse experience under my belt, I have now embraced the path of a software development student, driven by a fervent passion for using technology to brighten and enrich people's lives. Whether through engaging games or practical apps, my goal is to leverage my skills to create digital experiences that uplift and inspire. Remember, everyone has the right to happiness, and I aim to contribute to that through my work.

projects.title: Seattle Day Planner by Tech City Apps
projects.description: This was my first team project, this is a dynamic project that blends real-time weather data with intuitive task management to streamline and optimize daily planning.
